gameDetails.name: Cartographers: Architects Mini Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Set out to chart the Stonespine Mountains! You may encounter an ambush by a slime monster, but thankfully a new hero Hortgully is there to protect you!

Enjoy four new cards that add more variety to your games of Cartographers and Cartographers Heroes. All the cards have thematic tie-ins to Stonespine Architects.


     1 ambush card (Slime)
     1 hero card (the minotaur Hortgully)
     1 scoring card (earn points for different terrain types next to a mountain)
     1 explore card (draw a mountain anywhere)


—description from the publisher
